parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the Datadog query. e.g. autoscaling_group:myapp-prod-v002

post.summary: Exercise the Stackdriver Metrics Service directly, without any orchestration or judging

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Used to identify the type of the resource being queried, e.g. aws_ec2_instance, gce_instance.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location to use when scoping the query. Valid choices depend on what cloud platform the query relates to (could be a region, a namespace, or something else).

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The name of the resource to use when scoping the query. The most common use-case is to provide a server group name.
